overview: How far would you go to get a shot at the big time? When a young film-maker has to decide between making his dream movie and the porn masterpiece his financier is looking for, his priorities are in for a bit of a shuffle. Of course, when you add the luscious Keri Sable to the mix, the results are bound to be magic. Can you say "Lights, Camera... Action!"?
title: All About Keri
